titleStmt.title: Report to the archive concerning temple documents that have been sent

msContents.summary: Notification concerning temple documents that have been sent

msItem.note: Source of description: Recto; Verso blank
Related to P. Fouad 186-189 (ed. A. Bataille, Un nouveau dieu Ä Bacchias, –tudes de papyrologie, 4, 1938, p. 197-205)

origin.origPlace: Bakchias, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

div.ab: To ..., having been, by Commodus Antoninus, excellent besides being idios logos, appointed for examination of the inventories and of the incomes of the temple and of the management of the priests. From Peteuris, son of Peteuris and grandson of Mystes and prebyteros of the priests of the famous temple of the great god Soknobraisis of the village of Bakchias. List of priests and temple inventory for the current year, ... of our lord Aurelius Commodus Antoninus Caesar

listBibl.bibl: P. Lund. III 4 P. Bacch. 6 SB VI 9335 TM 14153; Wilcken, U., Archiv fír Papyrusforschung 13 (1939) p. 233; Hombert, M., Chronique d'–gypt 14, 1939, p. 400-401
